Painting inventory number.description: The unique inventory number of the painting

Owner.description: The ID of the Owner (linked to Owner - Institution or Person)

Permanent location.description: The permanent location of the painting if different from the owner

Artist.description: The ID of the artist (linked to the Artist model)

Confidence Level.description: The level of confidence in the attribution

Attribution Type.description: The attribution type for the artist

value.description: The date of production in YYYY/MM/DD format

Confidence Flag.description: Confidence in the date of production

Date Prefix.description: Prefix to indicate uncertainty in the date

Height (cm).description: The height of the painting in cm

Width (cm).description: The width of the painting in cm

Support.description: The support(s) used in the painting

Binding medium.description: The binding medium(s) used in the painting

Painting school.description: The painting school(s) the painting is associated with

City.description: The city where the painting was produced

Country.description: The country where the painting was produced

Confidence Flag.description: Confidence in the location of production

Preparation classification.description: The preparation classification of the painting

Preparation colour lightness descriptor.description: The lightness of the preparation colour

Preparation colour modifier.description: The modifier for the preparation colour

Main preparation colour.description: The main colour used in the preparation layer

Preparation comment.description: Additional comments or notes about the preparation

Painting creditline.description: The creditline information for the painting

Image digital object ID.description: ID of the image, defined as a separate digital object in Cordra

IIIF Thumbnail URL.description: A full IIIF URL pointing to a 250px thumbnail representation of the linked image

Has thumbnail.description: Link to a thumbnail representation of the painting, including a link to the image object and a IIIF thumbnail URL
